title: Ghoti (Igatpuri)
description: Prime residential layouts near Samruddhi Mahamarg & Igatpuri hub. These plots are ideal for weekend homes and offer excellent appreciation potential.
highlights: Quick access to Igatpuri Railway Station
Scenic surroundings ideal for second homes

title: Makhmalabad
description: Urban NA plots within Nashik city limits, perfect for housing. Located in a fast-developing residential zone with great connectivity.

title: Bhavani Nagar – Gonde Gaon (NH-3, Nashik)
description: Bhavani Nagar residential layout at Gonde Gaon is the only residential land project in the industrial hub of Nashik. Offering modern amenities, excellent connectivity, and eco-friendly living, it ensures a high-return investment opportunity.
highlights: Nearest to Asvali, Ghoti & Igatpuri Railway Stations
Located in fastest-growing industrial hub of Nashik
Easy access to schools, colleges, hospitals, water filtration plants

title: Ozar
description: Strategic location near Ozar Airport & Nashik’s industrial zone. Perfect mix of residential and investment potential.

title: Talwade (Trimbak)
description: Farmhouse plots surrounded by greenery & scenic Trimbak hills. Peaceful environment with a touch of nature.
